name: Terra Research Commission
trait: Attacks deal Physical Damage twice to ground enemies in a small radius (second time is an aftershock dealing half ATK in damage), and ignores the Deployment Limit, but has a long Redeployment Time

talent.name: Felyne Lottery Bomb
talent.desc: Attacks detonate after a delay, with one of the following random effects: Deal Physical Damage / Puts the target to Sleep / Stun the target / Nothing happens at all! Talent deactivates after triggering Damage effect 3 times

base skill: When this Operator is assigned to a Trading Post, order acquisition efficiency +5%, order limit +2, plus an additional order acquisition efficiency +3% for every Felvine
When this Operator is assigned to a Factory, capacity limit +8, Productivity +5%, plus an additional Productivity +1% for every Felvine
